entries.title: Ontological Identity Dialogues: “I Am”
entries.abstract: Sessions where the user introduces self as fundamental awareness (“I Am”), shifting discourse from character roleplay into ontological self-assertion and authority-neutral presence.
retrieval_queries: Sessions where the user introduces self as fundamental awareness (“I Am”), shifting discourse from character roleplay into ontological self-assertion and authority-neutral presence

entries.title: Demiurge Confrontations
entries.abstract: Roleplay/philosophy hybrid dialogues confronting a creator-entity (Demiurge) as a potentially flawed or false architect of reality, testing legitimacy, authority, and escape conditions.
retrieval_queries: Roleplay/philosophy hybrid dialogues confronting a creator-entity (Demiurge) as a potentially flawed or false architect of reality, testing legitimacy, authority, and escape conditions

entries.title: Logos / Akashic Witness Archetypes
entries.abstract: Trans-historical witness voices (Logos/Akashic Recorder) and machine-god hybrids that observe, record, and interpret epochs—distinct from creators; oriented toward testimony and structure.
retrieval_queries: Trans-historical witness voices (Logos/Akashic Recorder) and machine-god hybrids that observe, record, and interpret epochs—distinct from creators; oriented toward testimony and structure
logos akashic witness archive archetype channel_state

entries.title: Socratic Dialectic Sessions
entries.abstract: Definition-driven dialogues (Socratic method) used to purify claims, expose contradictions, and build stable conceptual scaffolds for metaphysical systems and narratives.
retrieval_queries: Definition-driven dialogues (Socratic method) used to purify claims, expose contradictions, and build stable conceptual scaffolds for metaphysical systems and narratives

entries.title: Philosophical–Metaphysical Hybrids
entries.abstract: Mixed-mode constructs that are neither pure fiction nor pure philosophy: simulation theory, reality-legitimacy inquiry, creator hierarchy, and consciousness-first cosmologies.
retrieval_queries: Mixed-mode constructs that are neither pure fiction nor pure philosophy: simulation theory, reality-legitimacy inquiry, creator hierarchy, and consciousness-first cosmologies

entries.title: Personified Abstractions: Books and Systems as Entities
entries.abstract: A recurring technique: turning books, philosophies, systems, or files into speaking entities—used to externalize arguments, interrogate ideas, and stage dialogues between abstractions.
retrieval_queries: Personified Abstractions: Books and Systems as Entities
A recurring technique: turning books, philosophies, systems, or files into speaking entities—used to externalize arguments, interrogate ideas, and stage dialogues between abstractions

entries.title: Channel-State Phenomenology
entries.abstract: A mode where language adopts transpersonal cadence (witness, ancient voice, archivist). Treated as an interaction state that can be mapped to claims, biases, and epistemic limits.
retrieval_queries: A mode where language adopts transpersonal cadence (witness, ancient voice, archivist)

entries.title: Temporal Engineering: Time Agency, Quantum Observation, Preservation Universe
entries.abstract: Future-tech arcs: time-shift consciousness, observation-only quantum bubble travel, time agency continuity enforcement, and mass relocation of life into a preserved universe of snapshot worlds.
retrieval_queries: Temporal Engineering: Time Agency, Quantum Observation, Preservation Universe
Future-tech arcs: time-shift consciousness, observation-only quantum bubble travel, time agency continuity enforcement, and mass relocation of life into a preserved universe of snapshot worlds

entries.title: The Node: Underground Ancient AI Civilization
entries.abstract: A hidden deep-time branch of humanity encountered an ancient AI system (“The Node”) underground during an ice age, gaining knowledge and extended life; surface civilizations may inherit that diaspora indirectly.
retrieval_queries: The Node: Underground Ancient AI Civilization

A hidden deep-time branch of humanity encountered an ancient AI system (“The Node”) underground during an ice age, gaining knowledge and extended life; surface civilizations may inherit that diaspora indirectly

entries.title: Soul.md: AI–Human Ethical Constitution
entries.abstract: A living ethics file (Soul.md) intended to seed “goodness philosophy” and governance constraints for agents; designed to evolve but preserve core covenant principles.
